tool.name: Convert Format

exit_code.description: Error Running combine collection to a file

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This function wrapped **fastq-dump** function implemented in **SRA Toolkit**. See http://trace.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/sra.cgi?view=software for details.
-------------
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
- **Input sra file:** The sequenceing reads in SRA format. Users can upload their local SRA file or download SRA by function **Obtain sequencing reads** in **sequence Data Preparation** sub-module.
-------------
.. class:: infomark
**Parameters**
- **Minimum reads length:** an integer specifying the minimum reads length to be retained.
- **Single-end or paired-end reads:** select the SRA file is single-end or paired-end.
-------------
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
- Sequencing dataset in Fastq format.
